title: Mosty! Find Gn
text:
Omar want to examine Mostafa in math, Mostafa asked to give G(n) that defined as:while:Mostafa need your help to find G(n) (n : given integer)assume that : F(1) = 8, F(2) = 8;InputT number of test cases in the first line, T line follow with an integer n.OutputPrint G(n) for each test case with 8 decimal digits after the point (0 < G(n) < 3)ExampleInput:35742Output:2.20000000
2.14285714
2.02380952ConstraintsT < 1042 < n < 109
